replies.body:
Why does the news hour always have 0 upvotes?
Does someone just down them all the time?

The News Hour isn't actually an account, it's a script. If you try click on "The News Hour" name link, you'll just end up in a sub board. There's no account called "The News Hour".

I presume the code is weird for scripts and they don't get automatic up votes like normal accounts do.
